roleset.name: take aim at
roleset.note: TARGET-V NOTES: Member of Vncls confront-98. VN updated by Julia. No comparison. (from target.01-v)
TARGETED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from targeted.01-j)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But the prospects for legislation that-1 *trace*-1 targets program trading is unlikely anytime soon.

example.name: passivized with instrument
example.text: [Small-lot buying]-1 targeted *trace*-1 at incentive-backed issues pushed up the Nikkei.

example.name: active with instrument
example.text: John targeted Mary with a big juicy spitwad.
